name: Camp Ground Elementary School
description: Camp Ground Elementary School is a public elementary school in the Laurel County School District serving students from pre-kindergarten through elementary grades. The school provides comprehensive educational services including academic instruction, special education programs, and extracurricular activities. The school is part of the Laurel County Public Schools system and serves the Camp Ground community area.
source: Verified from official Laurel County Schools website and multiple school directories
eligibility: Students residing in the Camp Ground Elementary School attendance zone
notes: Camp Ground Elementary School is part of the Laurel County School District. The school provides comprehensive educational services to students in the Camp Ground area. The school has a principal and full teaching staff. Parents can access information through the Infinite Campus Parent Portal and the school website.
